entry.title: Wednesday: Showers. High 19.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Snow level 1000 metres rising to 2500 metres near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 19. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing late this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
